description: The Lychee&nbsp;Bellini is a summertime classic. The invigorating combination of lychees and sparkling wine or champagne is the perfect way to beat the heat. And although it's a simple drink to make, there's something about the Lychee Bellini that feels truly luxurious.Perhaps it's the hint of sweetness from the lychees, or the delicate bubbles of the&nbsp;sparkling wine. Whatever the reason, the Lychee Bellini is sure to bring a touch of class to any summer gathering.So if you're looking for a mouthwatering and sophisticated drink to enjoy on a hot day, look no further than the Lychee Bellini.
name: Lychee Bellini
